arStrings.szText: {c_important}Blood Surge{/c} consumes Corpses to cause mini novas, dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} damage. Damage is increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%x|]{/c} per target drained by the initial cast, up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%x|]{/c}. Damage is also increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"|%x|]{/c} for each Corpse consumed.
